                                <a name="4494401860720800" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDBP431vO?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 18:19" date="1587032368000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494401860720800:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 18:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%9B%E9%98%9F%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E5%AE%8C%E6%88%90%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E5%9B%9E%E6%92%A4%23&amp;from=default">#军队援鄂医疗队完成任务回撤#</a> 转发致敬】经中央军委主席习近平批准，军队支援湖北医疗队在圆满完成承担的武汉火神山医院、武汉市泰康同济医院、湖北省妇幼保健院光谷院区确诊患者医疗救治任务后，采取民航包机和铁路运输投送方式，陆续离开武汉完成回撤。（图/央视军事） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4494401860720800"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>1056</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4494401860720800&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>9026</em></span>                        </span></span></a>
                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style="display:none;"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4494400464141811" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDBMOhntp?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 18:13" date="1587032035000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494400464141811:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 18:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%BE%8E%E4%BB%8E%E9%9B%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E5%88%B0%E9%87%8D%E5%A4%A7%E7%81%BE%E9%9A%BE%E7%9A%8470%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#全美从零感染到重大灾难的70天#</a>白宫，70天里你到底在干什么？】从确认新冠病毒向世界报告到首次无本土新增病例，中国用了78天。从1月3日中方开始定期向美方通报疫情信息和防控举措，到3月13日全美进入紧急状态，从“无一人去世”到“把死亡人数控制在10万”， 技术世界领先、资源和专家众多的美国， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDBMOhntp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494400464141811:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494400464141811&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%A5%E5%AE%9E%E6%8B%8D%E7%BA%BD%E7%BA%A6%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%8E%B0%E7%8A%B6%23&amp;from=default">#美国小哥实拍纽约最新疫情现状#</a>】4月14日，美国小哥实拍纽约的即时街景，解说美国疫情现状，当地市民已经意识到口罩的重要性，很多人戴上口罩。此外，他还探访纽约的餐厅、咖啡馆、超市、医院、公立学校……戳↓↓<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4494394910726094:1034-video:1034%3A4493936820158484:page_100206_home:2803301701:4494394910726094:2803301701" title="我是郭杰瑞的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wJhsn7" alt="http://t.cn/A6wJhsn7" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>我是郭杰瑞的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E5%A4%A7%E9%A3%8E%E9%BB%84%E8%89%B2%E9%A2%84%E8%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#北京发布大风黄色预警#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%B1%80%E5%9C%B0%E9%98%B5%E9%A3%8E%E8%BE%BE10%E7%BA%A7%23&amp;from=default">#北京局地阵风达10级#</a>】北京市气象台2020年4月16日17时00分升级发布大风黄色预警信号：预计17日09时至16时，本市大部分地区有4、5级偏北风，阵风8、9级，西部、北部局地10级，并伴有扬沙，请注意防范。（北京日报） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609501068&amp;ssig=xSoyo%2FRT0b" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4494384911498038" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDBnJ6hHU?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 17:12" date="1587028327000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494384911498038:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 17:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB14%E5%A4%A9%E5%90%8E%E5%8F%91%E7%97%85%23&amp;from=default">#北京境外输入病例隔离14天后发病#</a> 母亲、弟弟、外公均确诊】4月16日，在北京市新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会上，北京市疾控中心副主任庞星火通报了境外输入关联确诊病例相关情况，为聚集性病例，情况如下：<br>4月15日确诊的3名境外输入关联确诊病例为14日境外输入确诊病例的家庭密切接触者 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDBnJ6hHU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494384911498038:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494384911498038&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【正在直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%90%91%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E7%BB%8F%E9%AA%8C%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山向全球分享中国战疫经验#</a>】今天17时，钟南山院士等国内医疗专家通过腾讯会议与全球万名临床医生进行视频连线，分享中国从无症状者筛查、疑似诊断、确诊患者治疗、重症ICU方案到愈后检测的经验。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播，一起听<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E5%85%A8%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%84%E7%BB%8F%E9%AA%8C%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山首次分享新冠全路径经验#</a>！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4494382277016558:1034-video:1034%3A4494400655654922:page_100206_home:2803301701:4494382277016558:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6waEAJx" alt="http://t.cn/A6waEAJx" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%B1%85%E5%AE%B6%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E6%93%85%E8%87%AA%E5%A4%96%E5%87%BA%E5%B0%86%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AD%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E9%87%8D%E8%AE%A114%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#北京居家隔离擅自外出将集中隔离重计14天#</a>：费用自理】4月16日，在北京市新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会上，北京市委组织部部务委员徐颖表示，目前有个别居家观察人员不遵守政策规定，在居家期间擅自外出，带来疫情传播风险，社区（村）要加强居家观察管理，居家观察人员要严格遵守隔离观 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDBczDL04" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494377999475464:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494377999475464&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4494369953970278" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDAZBgEQK?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 16:12" date="1587024761000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494369953970278:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 16:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【为感激中国捐助者 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E5%BD%95%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E8%A1%A8%E8%BE%BE%E6%84%9F%E8%B0%A2%23&amp;from=default">#意大利医护录中文视频表达感谢#</a>】近日，意大利米兰萨科医院的医护人员用中文录制了一段视频，向为该医院捐赠了1万个外科口罩的中国捐助者表达感谢。“我和我的同事，意大利米兰萨科医院的医生们和医务人员都想对您表示衷心的感谢。”视频全程使用中文，并配上英、中、意三语字幕。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDAZBgEQK" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494369953970278:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494369953970278&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【直播预告：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%90%91%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E7%BB%8F%E9%AA%8C%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山向全球分享中国战疫经验#</a>】今天下午17时，钟南山院士等国内医疗专家与欧洲、美国、非洲临床医生进行视频连线，将面向全球万名医生直播。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E5%85%A8%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%84%E7%BB%8F%E9%AA%8C%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山首次分享新冠全路径经验#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 即将直播，敬请期待！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4494354930986890" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDABn48JA?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 15:12" date="1587021179000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494354930986890:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 15:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E9%99%8D%E8%87%B350%E4%BE%8B%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%23&amp;from=default">#现有本土重症病例降至50例以下#</a>】国家卫健委新闻发言人米锋表示，4月16日全国现有本土重症病例降至50例以下，新增本土确诊病例12例，均为境外输入关联病例，多为聚集性。应加强对入境人员的健康监测和管理，形成防控闭环，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%A5%E9%98%B2%E8%81%9A%E9%9B%86%E6%80%A7%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%8F%8D%E5%BC%B9%23&amp;from=default">#严防聚集性疫情反弹#</a>。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4494354930986890:1042163-video:1042163%3A4494354870632488:page_100206_home:2803301701:4494354930986890:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6waJAxL" alt="http://t.cn/A6waJAxL" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IDAwgzv8M&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frmrb&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E4%BC%AF%E7%A4%BC%E9%99%A2%E5%A3%AB%E4%BB%8E%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%90%AF%E7%A8%8B%E5%9B%9E%E5%A4%A9%E6%B4%A5%23&amp;from=default">#张伯礼院士从武汉启程回天津#</a>】4月16日上午，中国工程院院士、天津中医药大学校长张伯礼从武汉启程回天津。72岁的张伯礼在武汉进行了胆囊摘除手术，双腿出现血栓，但他在手术后第3天又投入工作，“绝对不撤离战线”！是院士，也是战士。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E4%BC%AF%E7%A4%BC%E9%99%A2%E5%A3%AB%E5%87%AF%E6%97%8B%23&amp;from=default">#张伯礼院士凯旋#</a>，致敬！&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4494347585798338:1034-video:1034%3A4494347169628207:page_100206_home:2803301701:4494347585798338:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6watBdH" alt="http://t.cn/A6watBdH" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%AB%E6%98%9F%E4%BF%AF%E7%9E%B0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%8B%E7%9A%84%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E5%90%8D%E8%83%9C%23&amp;from=default">#卫星俯瞰疫情下的全球名胜#</a>：泰姬陵、东京迪士尼、佛罗伦萨大教堂等空空荡荡】新冠肺炎疫情爆发之后，由于大多数国家实施了“封城”措施，以往游人如织的著名景点、闹市区，现在变得空空荡荡。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%AB%E6%98%9F%E4%BF%AF%E7%9E%B0%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E5%90%8D%E8%83%9C%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%89%8D%E5%90%8E%E5%AF%B9%E6%AF%94%23&amp;from=default">#卫星俯瞰全球名胜疫情前后对比#</a>↓↓<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4494328690934053:2017607-video:2017607%3A4494303859507228:page_100206_home:2803301701:4494328690934053:2803301701" title="小央视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wXHL1R" alt="http://t.cn/A6wXHL1R" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>小央视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4494322307348762" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDzKKuPKq?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 13:03" date="1587013401000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494322307348762:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 13:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%83%BD%E6%B1%9F%E5%A0%B0%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E6%8B%8D%E5%88%B0%E9%87%8E%E7%94%9F%E5%A4%A7%E7%86%8A%E7%8C%AB%E5%B8%A6%E5%A8%83%E6%95%A3%E6%AD%A5%23&amp;from=default">#都江堰首次拍到野生大熊猫带娃散步#</a> 网友：全国统一带娃模式】近日，四川都江堰龙溪虹口国家级自然保护区首次拍到野生大熊猫“母子同框”画面。一只胖硕的熊猫左顾右盼，向竹林深处走去，身后是一只浑身是泥的大熊猫宝宝。这也是当地第一次拍摄到成年母熊猫带幼体小熊猫一起觅食、散步的镜头。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDzKKuPKq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494322307348762:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494322307348762&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【好美！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2330%E7%A7%92%E8%88%AA%E6%8B%8D%E5%BC%80%E5%BE%80%E6%98%A5%E5%A4%A9%E7%9A%84%E5%88%97%E8%BD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#30秒航拍开往春天的列车#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】京郊山花烂漫，再现<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8E%B0%E5%AE%9E%E7%89%88%E8%8A%B1%E6%B5%B7%E5%88%97%E8%BD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#现实版花海列车#</a>美景。北京延庆八达岭长城附近山花烂漫，桃花、杏花、樱花沿山势连绵起伏，古老的长城蜿蜒向上，市郊铁路穿行其中，形成一幅“花海列车”的美丽画卷。你想去看看吗？<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4494316699223129:1034-video:1034%3A4494264164614148:page_100206_home:2803301701:4494316699223129:2803301701" title="京城铁叔的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wXL0vI" alt="http://t.cn/A6wXL0vI" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>京城铁叔的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86%E4%B8%AD%E8%80%83%E5%BB%B6%E6%9C%9F%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E6%9C%88%23&amp;from=default">#重庆中考延期一个月#</a>】重庆市教委4月16日印发《关于延迟2020年初中学业水平暨普通高中招生考试的通知》。通知指出，2020年中考顺延一个月，举行时间为7月12日至14日。考试科目、每科考试时间和计分办法等维持不变。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86%E4%B8%AD%E8%80%83%E5%BB%B6%E8%87%B37%E6%9C%8812%E6%97%A5%E8%87%B314%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#重庆中考延至7月12日至14日#</a>（蒋云龙） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【广州警方：依法处置涉疫情涉外违法犯罪案件，对所有人员一视同仁、平等以待】广州市公安局二级巡视员蔡巍介绍，广州警方始终坚持严格公正文明规范执法，依法处置涉疫情涉外违法犯罪案件，确保对所有人员一视同仁、平等以待。<br><br>近期，根据上级机关的统一部署，出台广州市公安机关疫情防控期间多项涉外 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDzerCYzg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494302279289290:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494302279289290&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E5%8B%92%E7%97%95%E8%84%B8%E5%88%B7%E5%B1%8F%23&amp;from=default">#意大利医生勒痕脸刷屏#</a>：不同的故事，同样的感动】35岁的意大利医生尼古拉·斯加尔比之前不爱自拍，但他的一张自拍照在社交媒体上刷屏：24万个点赞，7.1万条评论，7.56万转发。新冠疫情肆虐全球，白衣战士们不顾个人安危，奋战在最前沿。面对在现实生活和网络空间一次又一次响起的掌声，他们中还有人 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDz8Zz7vj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494298898370329:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494298898370329&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IDyZs1aQU&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609501076&amp;ssig=Ge7NMU58rz" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4494292980280048" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDyZs1aQU?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 11:06" date="1587006409000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494292980280048:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 11:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【举语寄千里，守得一日归！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%88%E5%A4%AB%E4%B8%BE%E8%AF%97%E9%80%81%E5%88%AB%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%A6%BB%E5%AD%90%E5%8F%88%E4%B8%BE%E8%AF%97%E8%BF%8E%E6%8E%A5%23&amp;from=default">#丈夫举诗送别援鄂妻子又举诗迎接#</a>】15日，江苏援湖北医疗队队员李勤平安回家，与前来迎接的丈夫张育峰紧紧相拥。67天前，张育峰举牌送妻子出征武汉“衣白卦，破楼兰，赤子切记平安还”，如今他再次写诗“守得江城迎翌日，白褂何曾逊霓裳”“举语寄千里，守得一日归”。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDyZs1aQU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494292980280048:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494292980280048&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【你下单了吗？<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%8B%E8%8A%B1%E5%BC%8F%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%E5%B8%A6%E8%B4%A7%E5%A4%A7%E8%B5%8F%23&amp;from=default">#疫情下花式直播带货大赏#</a>】疫情期间，直播带货、线上团购、云旅游、云逛街……各地商家直播带货带火消费，开辟销路。更有多地市长、区长为本地特产“代言”，线上推荐。你下过单吗，又买了啥？评论区见___↓↓<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%8D%E4%BA%A7%E4%BF%9D%E5%8D%AB%E6%88%98%23&amp;from=default">#复工复产保卫战#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B3%95%E5%9B%BD%E8%88%AA%E6%AF%8D%E4%B8%89%E5%88%86%E4%B9%8B%E4%B8%80%E8%88%B9%E5%91%98%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#法国航母三分之一船员感染新冠病毒#</a>】据法国国防部，当地时间15日晚，“戴高乐”号航母上已有三分之一的船员（668人）新冠病毒检测呈阳性，其中31人已于当天进入土伦军医院接受治疗，有1人进入重症监护室。“戴高乐”号是法国唯一一艘现役航母。（央视） ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4494282973128037&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>7282</em></span>                        </span></span></a>
                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style="display:none;"></div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4494277113103854" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDyzRd1sa?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 10:03" date="1587002626000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494277113103854:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 10:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E9%A3%9E%E6%9C%BA%E6%9D%A5%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%87%87%E8%B4%AD%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%23&amp;from=default">#全球最大飞机来中国采购防疫物资#</a>：6台发动机，可装载250吨物资】当地时间4月14日上午10点左右，世界上唯一一架安-225“梦幻”运输机从天津飞抵波兰华沙。波兰外交部称，机上载有2家波兰公司从中国采购的1050立方米新冠病毒防护装备，包括76吨防护服、11吨防护面罩和9吨口罩。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4494277113103854:2358773-video:2358773%3A4494069032747049:page_100206_home:2803301701:4494277113103854:2803301701" title="央视财经的酷燃视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wiH245" alt="http://t.cn/A6wiH245" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视财经的酷燃视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <h4 class="WB_feed_spec_tit W_autocut"><a href="http://krcom.cn/2258727970/episodes/2358773:4494069032747049" target="_blank" class="S_func1" suda-uatrack="key=kr_card&amp;value=kr_title"><span class="S_spetxt"></span>来华采购 最大飞机运送抗疫物资抵波兰</a></h4>
                                <div class="WB_feed_spec_row W_autocut"><span class="S_txt2"><a href="//weibo.com/u/2258727970" class="S_txt2" target="_blank" suda-uatrack="key=kr_card&amp;value=kr_nickname">央视财经</a></span> <span class="S_txt2">20200415期</span></div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4494271719683243" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDyr9ED3l?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 09:42" date="1587001340000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494271719683243:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 09:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【今明两年，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%BA%8B%E4%B8%9A%E5%8D%95%E4%BD%8D%E4%BC%98%E5%85%88%E6%8B%9B%E8%81%98%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E7%94%9F%23&amp;from=default">#北京事业单位优先招聘高校毕业生#</a>】16日，北京两部门发布通知，明确<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%8A%A0%E5%A4%A7%E9%9D%A2%E5%90%91%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E7%94%9F%E5%85%AC%E5%BC%80%E6%8B%9B%E8%81%98%E5%8A%9B%E5%BA%A6%23&amp;from=default">#北京加大面向高校毕业生公开招聘力度#</a>，今明两年，本市事业单位空缺岗位主要用于专项招聘高校毕业生（含择业期内未落实工作单位的高校毕业生）。同时明确，疫情防控机构补充医护人员优先采用绿色通道招聘，远郊区基层一 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDyr9ED3l" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494271719683243:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494271719683243&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%BC%BA%E8%B0%83%E9%87%8D%E8%A7%86%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山强调重视入境人员检测#</a>】钟南山院士说，我们国内的病情基本稳定住了，但是其他国家的发展不容乐观；而且病毒的潜伏期因人而异，我们必须要对入境的外籍人员进行必要的检测。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4494266460071590:1034-video:1034%3A4494017711243279:page_100206_home:2803301701:4494266460071590:2803301701" title="CGTN记者团的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wiyIHB" alt="http://t.cn/A6wiyIHB" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>CGTN记者团的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E64%E4%BE%8B%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增64例无症状感染者#</a>】4月15日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者64例，其中境外输入无症状感染者3例；当日转为确诊病例6例（境外输入2例）；当日解除医学观察49例（境外输入12例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者1032例（境外输入217例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E34%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增34例境外输入病例#</a>】据国家卫健委通报，4月15日0—24时，新增34例境外输入病例。境外输入现有确诊病例898例（含重症病例46例），现有疑似病例61例。累计确诊病例1534例，累计治愈出院病例636例，无死亡病例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>

                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4494254355404174&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>3580</em></span>                        </span></span></a>
                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style="display:none;"></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4494253143384124" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDxXcecmE?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 08:28" date="1586996911000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494253143384124:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 08:28</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E8%B0%88%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B9%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E7%BE%A4%E4%BD%93%E5%85%8D%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏谈西方国家群体免疫#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E7%B1%BB%E5%8E%86%E5%8F%B2%E6%B2%A1%E6%9C%89%E4%BC%A0%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E9%80%9A%E8%BF%87%E7%BE%A4%E4%BD%93%E5%85%8D%E7%96%AB%E6%8E%A7%E5%88%B6%23&amp;from=default">#人类历史没有传染病通过群体免疫控制#</a>】4月15日下午，上海新冠肺炎医疗救治专家组组长张文宏教授在视频连线欧洲时称：“人类文明史上，没有一次传染病的控制是通过群体免疫的。有没有见过群体免疫？有，麻疹、天花，而水痘还没有完全建成。靠什么？靠疫苗。”另外，张 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDxXcecmE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494253143384124:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494253143384124&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E16%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江新增16例境外输入病例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江新增4例本土病例#</a>】据黑龙江省卫健委通报，2020年4月15日0-24时,黑龙江省省内新增确诊病例4例、新增无症状感染者11例（哈尔滨市）。截至4月15日24时，累计报告本土确诊病例505例，现有确诊病例23例（哈尔滨市），现有无症状感染者16例（哈尔滨市）。当日发热门 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDxKLy5wH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494245438124399:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494245438124399&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【最高检：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%8A%E5%B9%B4%E5%89%8D%E4%B8%89%E6%9C%88%E8%B5%B7%E8%AF%89%E6%80%A7%E4%BE%B5%E6%9C%AA%E6%88%90%E5%B9%B4%E4%BA%BA%E7%8A%AF%E7%BD%AA4151%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#今年前三月起诉性侵未成年人犯罪4151人#</a>】4月15日，最高人民检察院通报今年第一季度检察办案数据。在未成年人检察方面，2020年1至3月，全国检察机关共批准逮捕未成年人犯罪和侵害未成年人犯罪8668人，不捕2920人。其中，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%8A%E5%B9%B4%E5%89%8D%E4%B8%89%E6%9C%88%E6%89%B9%E6%8D%95%E6%9C%AA%E6%88%90%E5%B9%B4%E7%8A%AF%E7%BD%AA%E5%AB%8C%E7%96%91%E4%BA%BA3987%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#今年前三月批捕未成年犯罪嫌疑人3987人#</a>，不捕2003人。全国检察机关 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDxFPszuV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494242376809641:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494242376809641&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            </ul>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E8%88%AA%E7%8F%AD%E7%BB%8F%E5%81%9C%E5%A4%AA%E5%8E%9F%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E8%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#国际航班经停太原入境新增8例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A61%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#山西累计境外输入确诊61例#</a>】2020年4月15日0-24时，山西省新增境外输入确诊病例8例（其中重症1例）、疑似病例0例、无症状感染者0例，均为国际航班经停太原入境人员，无山西省内自行活动轨迹。<br>截至2020年4月15日24时，山西省累计报告境外输入确诊病例61例，治愈出院 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDxs0t42y" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494233806927046:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494233806927046&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4494232255545716" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDxpvngH2?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 07:05" date="1586991931000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494232255545716:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 07:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%9A%82%E5%81%9C%E8%B5%84%E5%8A%A9%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织回应美国暂停资助#</a>：非常遗憾】世界卫生组织总干事谭德塞周三对美国总统特朗普下令暂停向世卫组织缴纳会费一事作出回应，表示“非常遗憾”，谭德塞称世卫组织将与其他成员合作填补资金缺口，确保工作持续、不中断。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4494232255545716:2017607-video:2017607%3A4494175882641415:page_100206_home:2803301701:4494232255545716:2803301701" title="中报视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6w6jvqM" alt="http://t.cn/A6w6jvqM" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>中报视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

        </div>
    </div>

                                <a name="4494230024567528" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IDxlUjadO?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-16 06:56" date="1586991399000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4494230024567528:fromprofile"> 2020-4-16 06:56</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E7%A7%B0%E8%AE%A1%E5%88%925%E6%9C%881%E6%97%A5%E5%89%8D%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%23&amp;from=default">#特朗普称计划5月1日前复工#</a>】当地时间15日，美国白宫记者会上，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E7%A7%B0%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%B7%B2%E5%BA%A6%E8%BF%87%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E9%AB%98%E5%B3%B0%E6%9C%9F%23&amp;from=default">#特朗普称美国已度过新增病例高峰期#</a>。他同时表示，白宫即将对各州提供重新开放经济的指导方针。特朗普没有提供指导方针的细节，但他表示会在美国东部时间16日下午发布相关声明。他希望5月1日前部分州能够重新开放经济。（张梦旭） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDxlUjadO" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494230024567528:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494230024567528&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%BA%A663.5%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠肺炎确诊约63.5万例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%98%E5%91%98%E7%A7%B0%E7%BA%BD%E7%BA%A6%E5%B7%9E%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%B7%B2%E8%BF%9B%E5%85%A5%E5%B9%B3%E7%BC%93%E6%9C%9F%23&amp;from=default">#官员称纽约州疫情已进入平缓期#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学发布的全球新冠肺炎数据实时统计系统，截至美国东部时间4月15日晚6时，全美共报告新冠肺炎确诊634975例，死亡27940例，共检测3242755例。在过去24小时，全美新增确诊31986例，新增死亡2365例。<br>在疫情最为 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IDxffsV1Z" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4494225896892415:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4494225896892415&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%EF%BC%8C%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#你好，明天#</a>】特朗普宣布断供世卫组织，招致国际社会批评。与疫情鏖战的关键时刻，停止向尽职尽责的世卫组织输送弹药，不啻于拉病毒一把。这种短视之举，本质上是寻找替罪羊，转移自身责任。结果惩罚的不是世卫组织，而是美国民众。别再甩锅，别再“加戏”，别再“抽梯子”，大国当尽大责任。 ​​​​                                            </div>

a=$CONFIG,b=FM.view;FM.init({jsPath:a.jsPath,cssPath:a.cssPath,mJsPath:a.mJsPath});FM.view=function(a){a=a||{};var c=a.js,f="domid",g="ns",h,i;c=c&&[].concat(c);a[f]=a[f]||a.pid;a.js=c=c&&c[0];g in a||(a[g]=d(c));a.css=h=[].concat(a.css||[]);a.cssid=i=[].concat(a.cssid||[]);for(var j=i.length,k=h.length;j<k;++j)i[j]=e(h[j]);b(a)}}()
</script>
<script>FM.view({"domid":"pl_lib","js":"home/js/pl/lib.js?version=737b1bcbc5c6542c","jsDefer":true});</script>

                                                                                                             【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" 转发致敬】经中央军委主席习近平批准，军队支援湖北医疗队在圆满完成承担的武汉火神山医院、武汉市泰康同济医院、湖北省妇幼保健院光谷院区确诊患者医疗救治任务后，采取民航包机和铁路运输投送方式，陆续离开武汉完成回撤。（图\/央视军事） ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n                                                                                           【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" suda-data=\"key=tblog_home_new&value=feed_time:4494369953970278:fromprofile\"> 2020-4-16 16:12<\/a> 来自 <a class=\"S_txt2\" suda-uatrack=\"key=profile_feed&value=pubfrom_guest\" class=\"PCD_user_b S_bg1\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民日报\">\n                                                                                                                        【为感激中国捐助者 <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E5%BD%95%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E8%A1%A8%E8%BE%BE%E6%84%9F%E8%B0%A2%23&from=default\">#意大利医护录中文视频表达感谢#<\/a>】近日，意大利米兰萨科医院的医护人员用中文录制了一段视频，向为该医院捐赠了1万个外科口罩的中国捐助者表达感谢。“我和我的同事，意大利米兰萨科医院的医生们和医务人员都想对您表示衷心的感谢。”视频全程使用中文，并配上英、中、意三语字幕。                                                                                                              【直播预告：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E5%85%A8%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%84%E7%BB%8F%E9%AA%8C%23&from=default\">#钟南山首次分享新冠全路径经验#<\/a>，<a                                                                                           【卫健委：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\"
